nfr_predictions.title: Performance
nfr_predictions.description: The system must provide a fast and efficient parsing process, with a response time of less than 2 seconds for a typical CV.

nfr_predictions.title: Reliability
nfr_predictions.description: The system shall be designed to be highly reliable, with a uptime of at least 99.9% and a mean time between failures (MTBF) of at least 1000 hours.

nfr_predictions.title: Security
nfr_predictions.description: The system must ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of user data, and must comply with all relevant data protection regulations.

nfr_predictions.title: Privacy
nfr_predictions.description: The system shall respect user privacy and must not collect or store any personal data without explicit user consent.

nfr_predictions.title: Scalability
nfr_predictions.description: The system should be designed to scale horizontally, with the ability to handle a large number of concurrent users and a high volume of CVs.

nfr_predictions.title: Usability
nfr_predictions.description: The system must be user-friendly and easy to navigate, with clear and concise instructions and feedback.

nfr_predictions.title: Maintainability
nfr_predictions.description: The system should be designed to be easily maintainable, with clear and modular code and a robust testing framework.

nfr_predictions.title: Compatibility
nfr_predictions.description: The system must be compatible with a wide range of browsers and devices, and must work seamlessly with the HR module from Odoo ERP software.

nfr_predictions.title: Integration
nfr_predictions.description: The system should be designed to integrate seamlessly with other systems and tools, such as ChatGPT and the HR module from Odoo ERP software.
